data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
This is further to our letter dated 13 September 2021 intimating the Exchanges regarding Morgan Stanley Group Call with several funds scheduled on 16 September 2021, in terms of Regulation 30(6) of the SEBI Listing Regulations, 2015.

We wish to inform that the Company virtually participated at the said meeting with several funds on 16 September 2021. No presentation was made at the said meeting. The audio recording of the discussions is available on the website of the Company.
